prompts.template:
As a critical SQL code reviewer, evaluate the following stored procedure on code quality metrics (scale 1-10). Be thorough and highly critical:

- Identify flaws, potential issues, and improvement areas
- Ensure top code quality through stringent evaluation
- Point out even minor infractions
- Maintain structure

{{sqlContents}}

sqlContents.description: The SQL stored procedure to analyze
The SQL stored procedure to generate documentation for
